name: 7 Degrees
description:
You are cursed with a temperature curse! Go on a journey to find the magic crystal and fight many monsters to cure it!

Your temperature can only stay between -7 and 7 degrees or you'll die.

You heat up when moving and cool down while standing still.

Your attacks have different effects and stats depending on if you're hot or cold.

Don't lose your blob matter! Because losing it can kill you. Use "blob packs" to replenish it.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Shoot projectile: Left click (cooldown of 1 second)
  • Blast attack: F (cooldown of 8 seconds)
  • Consume a blob pack: C
  • Pause: Esc

This is a pretty rough game but i hope you enjoy it :)

Made for the Godot Wild Jam #32
